name: embed
summary: The `<embed>` HTML element embeds external content at the specified point in the document. This content is provided by an external application or other source of interactive content such as a browser plug-in.
contentCategories: Flow content, phrasing content, embedded content, interactive content, palpable content.
permittedContent: None, it is an empty element.
tagOmission: Must have a start tag, and must not have an end tag.
permittedParents: Any element that accepts embedded content.

height.name: height
height.summary: The displayed height of the resource, in CSS pixels. This must be an absolute value; percentages are not allowed.

src.name: src
src.summary: The URL of the resource being embedded.

type.name: type
type.summary: The MIME type to use to select the plug-in to instantiate.

width.name: width
width.summary: The displayed width of the resource, in CSS pixels. This must be an absolute value; percentages are not allowed.
